video_title: Jordi Baylina (Polygon Cofounder)_ZisK: proving in real time
description:
"I'll talk about Indistinguishable Ofuscation and an universa ofuscated VM.
I'll talk about the applications that this tech unlocks.
I'll also give an state of the art of the progress of this tech."
